main_title: Nazca Lines: Ancient Art or Astronomical Calendar?
hook: [curious] You won't believe these massive geoglyphs in Peru! The Nazca Lines cover 500 square kilometers, depicting creatures like monkeys and hummingbirds.
description: Nazca Lines in Peru: ancient art or astronomical markers? This mystery has puzzled experts for decades! #NazcaLines #AncientHistory #Mysterious
